name: Extra Virgin Lava Boil
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 43!

Theme: Sacrifices Must Be Made (I took it very literally)

The volcano is about to erupt! Legend has it, the volcano can be calmed through the sacrifice of virgins found in the ancient village at the base of the volcano. The virgins have been feuding with the local chickens, so maybe recruiting some chickens from the (?) barrels will help your cause? Be careful though! Not all the chickens want to be disturbed.

Post submission hour update: Fixed a bug where no audio would play. Original upload and fixed version are both available on itch.io.

Post-LD Update 2: Removed the development console from the build. Whoops!

Instructions

Grab the virgins with [Space], and bring them to the top of the volcano while dodging fireballs. Once you reach the very edge of the volcano opening, throw them in with [Space] to calm the volcano.
The barrels will either spawn a chicken, which can be used to absorb 1 hit by a fireball, or the barrel will stun you for a short period.

Controls:
  •  WASD or Arrows - Move
  •  Space - Pick up/throw virgins, open (?) barrels
Tools Used:
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio 2017 Community w/ Resharper
  • Gimp 2.0
  • Audacity
Credits:

  • https://www.dafont.com/flat-earth-scribe.font

Known Issues
  • It's supposed to be portrait mode, which doesn't look great with the default resolutions the unity player provides
  • You can get caught on the seams between houses
  • The chickens will get caught on the houses
  • You can walk off the "side" of the volcano up at the top
  • Barrels can spawn in houses
  • It's really not obvious how to play
